description: MainFragment.kt defines the main UI fragment for an Android TV application, displaying a grid of recipe cards organized by categories and handling user interactions such as clicking on recipes or initiating a search.

classes.name: MainFragment
classes.description: Main UI fragment for the TV app, displaying recipe categories in a grid layout.

methods.name: onActivityCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI elements, loads recipes, and sets up event listeners upon activity creation.

methods.name: setupUIElements
methods.description: Configures the visual elements of the UI, including title, headers, and colors.

methods.name: loadRecipes
methods.description: Loads recipe data, organizes it by categories, and populates the grid layout with recipe cards.

methods.name: setupEventListeners
methods.description: Sets up click listeners for recipe items and search button to navigate to detail or search screens.
